mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.author, b.reportFlag, coalesce(r.is_reported, false) as is_reported, b.created_at from board_tb b left join report_tb r ON r.board_id = b.id
mapper.update: update board_tb set reportFlag = ( case when reportFlag = true then false when reportFlag = false then true end ) where id = #{id}
